result.markdown:
--- title: "DCAT Metadata Schema" editor_options: chunk_output_type: console --- ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html} DCAT Schema ISO8601 ``` ::: ::: ## `dataset` Fields * [Data Catalog Vocabulary (DCAT) - Version 3](https://www.w3.org/TR/vocab-dcat/) ### `bureauCode` Federal agencies, combined agency and bureau code from [OMB Circular A-11, Appendix C](https://obamawhitehouse.archives.gov/sites/default/files/omb/assets/a11_current_year/app_c.pdf). > __Format__: `015:11` ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} bureau_code() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 368 × 6 agencyName bureauName agencyCode bureauCode treasuryCode cgacCode 1 Legislative Branch Senate 001 05 00 000 2 Legislative Branch House of Repr… 001 10 00 000 3 Legislative Branch Joint Items 001 11 00 000 4 Legislative Branch Capitol Police 001 13 02 002 5 Legislative Branch Office of Com… 001 12 09 009 6 Legislative Branch Congressional… 001 14 08 008 7 Legislative Branch Architect of … 001 15 01 001 8 Legislative Branch Botanic Garden 001 18 09 009 9 Legislative Branch Library of Co… 001 25 03 003 10 Legislative Branch Government Pr… 001 30 04 004 # ℹ 358 more rows ``` ::: ::: ### `programCode` Federal agencies, list the primary program related to this data asset, from the [Federal Program Inventory](https://resources.data.gov/schemas/dcat-us/v1.1/FederalProgramInventory_FY13_MachineReadable_091613.csv). > __Format__: `015:001` ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} program_code() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 1,554 × 6 agencyName programName additionalInfo agencyCode programCode 1 Department of Agriculture Rural Busine… 005 005-001 2 Department of Agriculture Rural Busine… 005 005-002 3 Department of Agriculture Energy Assis… 005 005-003 4 Department of Agriculture Distance Lea… 005 005-004 5 Department of Agriculture Rural Electr… 005 005-005 6 Department of Agriculture Rural Water … 005 005-006 7 Department of Agriculture Single Famil… 005 005-007 8 Department of Agriculture Multi-Family… 005 005-008 9 Department of Agriculture Farm labor H… 005 005-009 10 Department of Agriculture Rental Assis… 005 005-010 # ℹ 1,544 more rows # ℹ 1 more variable: programCodePODfmt ``` ::: ::: ### `accrualPeriodicity` ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tibble( accrualPeriodicity = c( "R/PT1S", "R/PT1H", "R/P1D", "R/P3.5D", "R/P0.33W", "R/P0.5W", "R/P1W", "R/P2W", "R/P0.33M", "R/P0.5M", "R/P1M", "R/P2M", "R/P3M", "R/P4M", "R/P6M", "R/P1Y", "R/P2Y", "R/P3Y", "R/P4Y", "R/P10Y"), accrualDescription = recode_iso8601(accrualPeriodicity)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 20 × 2 accrualPeriodicity accrualDescription 1 R/PT1S Continuously Updated 2 R/PT1H Hourly 3 R/P1D Daily 4 R/P3.5D Semiweekly 5 R/P0.33W Three Times a Week 6 R/P0.5W Twice a Week 7 R/P1W Weekly 8 R/P2W Biweekly 9 R/P0.33M Three Times a Month 10 R/P0.5M Twice a Month 11 R/P1M Monthly 12 R/P2M Bimonthly 13 R/P3M Quarterly 14 R/P4M Three Times a Year 15 R/P6M Semiannually 16 R/P1Y Annually 17 R/P2Y Biennially 18 R/P3Y Triennially 19 R/P4Y Quadrennially 20 R/P10Y Decennially ``` ::: ::: ### DCAT JSON Schemas #### Catalog ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} listview(fload(here("data/dcat-us_v1.1_schema_catalog.json"))) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
